name: Creepy Evil Grandpa
description:
Breaking a window of that scary neighbor looked like a good idea at a time, wasn't it. Why, in hell you did that!
Now you need to find a way to escape that horror mansion. That blind lunatic hears everything. He doesn't sleep, he is silent and very dangerous. You need to play his game and solve those riddles to escape. Your mummy wouldn't help you! There is no father to take away your fears. You must be very quiet, listen to his scary stories and you will know is he near.

• He doesn't sleep,
• he is silent
• he is very dangerous.
